statements: SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM LoanPerformance WHERE borrower_id = 123;
SELECT loan_id, loan_end_date, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance ORDER BY loan_start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM LoanPerformance;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_id = 101;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM LoanPerformance WHERE borrower_id = 200 ORDER BY loan_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount), COUNT(*) FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_date FROM LoanPerformance ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount >= 10000;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_date FROM LoanPerformance WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_date > '2021-01-01' AND loan_amount > 10000
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT borrower_name) FROM LoanPerformance
SELECT loan_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_amount FROM LoanPerformance GROUP BY loan_id
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM PerformanceMetrics
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_status='Active';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name, loan_status FROM LoanPerformance ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_amount FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_status = 'Active';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name FROM LoanPerformance ORDER BY loan_start_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND loan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_status FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount, loan_status FROM LoanPerformance GROUP BY loan_status;
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_id, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, borrower_email FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 3;
SELECT loan_id, loan_date, loan_status FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT loan_id, payment_amount FROM LoanPayments WHERE payment_amount > 5000;
SELECT borrower_name, borrower_email FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM LoanPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM Borrowers INNER JOIN LoanPerformance ON Borrowers.borrower_id = LoanPerformance.borrower_id;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment, MIN(payment_amount) AS min_payment FROM LoanPayments;
SELECT * FROM LoanPerformance;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_start_date FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM LoanPerformance WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice';
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM LoanPerformance ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_start_date FROM LoanPerformance ORDER BY loan_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Borrowers WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_name FROM LoanPerformance WHERE loan_amount > 50000 ORDER BY loan_end_date DESC;
SELECT lp.loan_id, lp.loan_amount, lp.borrower_name, ld.loan_id, ld.status FROM LoanPerformance lp JOIN LoanStatus ld ON lp.loan_id = ld.loan_id;

SELECT lp.borrower_name, ls.status, li.interest_rate FROM LoanPerformance lp JOIN LoanStatus ls ON lp.loan_id = ls.loan_id JOIN InterestRates li ON lp.loan_id = li.loan_id ORDER BY ls.last_updated DESC;
SELECT lp.borrower_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM LoanPerformance lp JOIN LoanPayments lpm ON lp.loan_id = lpm.loan_id GROUP BY lp.borrower_name HAVING total_payments > 2000;
